de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.ids

Interface DBIDs

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArrayDBIDs, ArrayModifiableDBIDs, ArrayStaticDBIDs, DBID, DBIDRange, DBIDVar, DistanceDBIDResult<D>, HashSetDBIDs, HashSetModifiableDBIDs, IntegerArrayStaticDBIDs, IntegerDBIDs, KNNResult<D>, ModifiableDBIDs, ModifiableDistanceDBIDResult<D>, SetDBIDs, StaticDBIDs
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoubleDistanceDBIDList, DoubleDistanceKNNList, EmptyDBIDs, GenericDistanceDBIDList, GenericKNNList, IntArrayStaticDBIDs, IntegerDBID, IntegerDBIDRange, IntegerDBIDVar, KNNUtil.KNNSubList, MaskedDBIDs, MergedDBIDs, TroveArrayDBIDs, TroveArrayModifiableDBIDs, TroveArrayStaticDBIDs, TroveHashSetModifiableDBIDs, UnmodifiableArrayDBIDs, UnmodifiableDBIDs, UnmodifiableIntegerArrayDBIDs, UnmodifiableIntegerDBIDs

    public interface DBIDs
    Interface for a collection of database references (IDs).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(DBIDRef o)
      Test whether an ID is contained.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Test for an empty DBID collection.
      DBIDIter iter()
      Get a DBID iterator (a more efficient API).
      int size()
      Retrieve the collection / data size.

    • Method Detail

      • iter

        DBIDIter iter()
        Get a DBID iterator (a more efficient API). usage example: 
         for(DBIDIter iter = ids.iter(); iter.valid(); iter.advance()) {
   DBID id = iter.getDBID();
 }
        Returns:
        iterator

      • size

        int size()
        Retrieve the collection / data size.
        Returns:
        collection size

      • contains

        boolean contains(DBIDRef o)
        Test whether an ID is contained.
        Parameters:
        o - object to test
        Returns:
        true when contained

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Test for an empty DBID collection.
        Returns:
        true when empty.
